message: How hard is it really to find an iPhone developer, an individual? Seems really difficult. I'm looking for one who can implement the design and logics to create a great app. This is a paid job (http://authenticjobs.com/jobs/8056/iphone-developer) with opportunity to be co-founder.
If anyone knows anyone who would fit, please link them to aforementioned link. Thanks.
where is this job based at?
I'm also looking for an iOS dev in San Francisco to join our funded startup. http://www.tappmedia.com

Hi, I'm a iOS dev (see my works on my website www.tugulab.org ) I'm also the cofounder of Challengein ( http://challengein.com ) a mobile startup who needs to move to SF.
It would be a cool having part time work and be able to continue to work on my startup the rest of the time
It's freelance so it's based anywhere at this point in time.
@themadray Are you still looking for somebody? I know a friend in the DC area that might be available.
@ccarnino Are you interested to working on some interesting IOS project? We are starting one and we are based in SF bayarea. If you are interested, please let me know.
A friend who takes freelance work. http://joeycastillo.com
@ccarnino I'm very much still interested can you ping me vial email. It's listed on the authenticjobs.com job post.
@lapchan Yes, I'm interested. I looking for a way to move to the bay area, SF can be great. Please give me your email and I'll send you my CV and a presentation about what I'm doing with my startup
@themadray Will do.  I know a couple of iPhone devs , just need to check on their availability.
